sentences.english: Our reporter interviewed the Beijing university of posts and telecommunications and telecom engineering college professor Chen lei.
sentences.chinese: 本報記者採訪了北京郵電大學電信工程學院教授陳磊。

sentences.english: Mr. Zhao shares a 12-square-meter with five others.
sentences.chinese: 趙磊和另外五人合租了一間12平方米的屋子。

sentences.english: Huang Lei isn't so good at tennis as Larry.
sentences.chinese: 黃磊不如拉里擅長打網球。

sentences.english: Chen Lei, en expert in gynaecology and obstetrics.
sentences.chinese: 今天來訪的嘉賓是婦產科專家陳磊醫生。

sentences.english: Lei is the eyes on this small park before deciding moved here .
sentences.chinese: 磊就是看中了這個小公園才決定搬來這裏的。

sentences.english: Wong Jing directs the movie and mainland actor Huang Lei is the leading actor.
sentences.chinese: 該部影片由王晶導演，大陸演員黃磊主演。

sentences.english: Yu Lei, a 24-year-old senior at Hebei University, marvels at how fast the translators work.
sentences.chinese: 24歲的於磊是河北大學大四的學生。

sentences.english: Shanghai Yaolei Martial Arts Gymnasium is the first integrative and professional martial arts gym in Pudong District.
sentences.chinese: 上海垚磊格鬥健身館是浦東首家綜合性專業武館。
